item.title: Projects
item.description: 2022 Personal data storage (Mar - Apr `22) Grocery delivery service (May `22 - now) 2021 School of Studio Oleg Ch. (May `21) Split the bill (thesis project) (Dec - Jun `21) The social network (Aug - Sep `21) Electronics Store (Dec - Jan `22) and ect. ðŸŽ’ School of Studio Oleg Ch. GitHub Repo: react-chsch Description The website of the school for the Design Studio. Typography, colors and elements are made in accordance with guideline Repetitive code is moved to pug mixins, and the styles are moved to variables that are generated from the json file html- and css-preprocessors are used add: semantic, adaptive
